IIT Kharagnar Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Senior Research Fellowship Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 21, 2025, 16:28 IST
 Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur
 2 Jobs |  Posted On : 21-Aug-2025 |  West Bengal |  Salary : 42,000 to 42,000




FOLLOW

Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Kharagpur has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Senior Research Fellowship Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech. in Electrical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the IIT Kharagpur Recruitment 2025. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in West Bengal.

IIT Kharagpur Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Senior Research Fellowship 	02	B.E/ B.Tech in Electrical Engineering

Age Limit for the IIT Kharagpur Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit:  32 years.

Selection Process for the IIT Kharagpur Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the IIT Kharagpur Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 42,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the IIT Kharagpur Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the IIT Kharagpur Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Senior Research Fellowship Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the applyonline link.
Log in with yur mobile number and password.
Fill out the given details carefully.
Submit the application form and capture the application number for further usage.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	05-08-2025
Last Date of Application	26-08-2025

 

Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
